content:
{"name": "notion_db_definitions", "type": "document", "content": "**AI-Enhanced Jesse: Database Definitions & Structure**

## **1. Purpose of This Document**
This document serves as a **living reference** for all structured databases within the AI-Enhanced Jesse system. It defines each table, its properties, relationships, and intended use to maintain data integrity and ensure seamless AI integration.

---

## **2. Core Database Tables & Definitions**

### **2.1 Personal Knowledge Database (PKD)**
**Purpose:** Stores overrides of AI recommendations based on personal experience, ensuring AI learns from personal insights.

**Properties:**
- **Name** *(Text)* – The key insight or override stored.
- **Description** *(Text)* – Explanation of why this overrides AI’s recommendation.
- **Tags** *(Multi-Select)* – Categories to classify the override.
- **Relevance to Jesse** *(Multi-Select)* – How this impacts life, work, automation, etc.
- **Deep Dive Available** *(Checkbox)* – Indicates if further documentation exists.
- **Contradictory AI Response** *(Text)* – If AI disagrees, explanation of conflict.
- **Review Needed** *(Checkbox)* – Flags overrides that may require periodic updates.
- **Knowledge Vault (Relation to KV)** *(1-way)* – Links to stored long-form knowledge that supports this override.
- **AI Workflows (Relation to AIW)** *(1-way)* – Links to workflows affected by this knowledge.
- **Created Date** *(Date)* – Timestamp when override was added.
- **Last Modified Date** *(Date)* – Timestamp of last update.

---

### **2.2 Knowledge Vault (KV)**
**Purpose:** Stores long-form knowledge (books, research, transcripts, etc.) for AI reference.

**Properties:**
- **Title** *(Text)* – Name of the document or source.
- **Author/Source** *(Text)* – The original creator of the content.
- **Tags** *(Multi-Select)* – Topics covered in this knowledge.
- **Files & Media** *(Attachment)* – Stores uploaded documents, transcripts, or references.
- **Deep Research Available** *(Checkbox)* – Marks knowledge that has been fully analyzed.
- **Publication Date** *(Date)* – Original date of publication.
- **Knowledge Vault (Relation to KV)** *(2-way)* – Links to other related knowledge.
- **AI Workflows (Relation to AIW)** *(1-way)* – Links to workflows utilizing this knowledge.
- **AI Research (Relation to AIR)** *(2-way)* – Connects to ongoing AI research efforts.
- **Created Date** *(Date)* – Timestamp when document was added.
- **Last Modified Date** *(Date)* – Timestamp of last update.

---

### **2.3 AI Research (AIR)**
**Purpose:** Tracks AI-related research, tools, and experimental insights.

**Properties:**
- **Name** *(Text)* – Title of the research or tool.
- **Tags** *(Multi-Select)* – Categories of AI application.
- **Relevance to Jesse** *(Multi-Select)* – Business, automation, personal growth, etc.
- **Deep Dive Available** *(Checkbox)* – Marks research that requires in-depth review.
- **Knowledge Vault (Relation to KV)** *(2-way)* – Links to stored research materials.
- **AI Workflows (Relation to AIW)** *(1-way)* – Links to workflows leveraging this research.
- **Priority Level** *(Single Select)* – Urgent, High, Medium, Low.
- **Review Needed** *(Checkbox)* – Flags research requiring updates.
- **Created Date** *(Date)* – Timestamp of when research was logged.
- **Last Modified Date** *(Date)* – Timestamp of last update.

---

### **2.4 AI Workflows (AIW)**
**Purpose:** Defines AI-driven processes and automation for decision-making.

**Properties:**
- **Name** *(Text)* – Workflow title.
- **Description** *(Text)* – Explanation of AI-driven automation process.
- **Tags** *(Multi-Select)* – Categories of automation.
- **Knowledge Vault (Relation to KV)** *(1-way)* – Links to supporting knowledge.
- **AI Research (Relation to AIR)** *(1-way)* – Links to relevant AI insights.
- **Priority Level** *(Single Select)* – Urgent, High, Medium, Low.
- **Review Needed** *(Checkbox)* – Flags workflows requiring updates.
- **Created Date** *(Date)* – Timestamp of when workflow was logged.
- **Last Modified Date** *(Date)* – Timestamp of last update.

---

### **2.5 Life Optimization (LO)**
**Purpose:** Tracks AI-driven optimizations in personal life, training, productivity, and financial management.

**Properties:**
- **Name** *(Text)* – Optimization effort title.
- **Description** *(Text)* – Explanation of process.
- **Tags** *(Multi-Select)* – Categories of optimization.
- **AI Tools Used** *(Text)* – AI tools leveraged in execution.
- **Optimization Plan** *(Text)* – Step-by-step approach.
- **Implementation Status** *(Single Select)* – Not Started, In Progress, Complete.
- **Results Analysis** *(Text)* – Post-execution review.
- **Result** *(Single Select)* – Below Expectations, Met Expectations, Exceeded Expectations.
- **Created Date** *(Date)* – Timestamp of when process was logged.
- **Last Modified Date** *(Date)* – Timestamp of last update.

---

## **3. System-Wide Properties & Standardization**

### **3.1 Master Tag System**
**Purpose:** Ensures consistent tagging across all tables.

**Properties:**
- **Tag Name** *(Text)* – The name of the tag.
- **Category** *(Multi-Select)* – Personal Growth, AI, Business, etc.
- **Parent Tag** *(Relation to Master Tag System)* – Parent-Child structuring when needed.
- **Created Date** *(Date)* – Timestamp of when tag was added.

---

## **4. Next Steps**
✅ **Review these definitions for accuracy**
✅ **Ensure each property aligns with intended data usage**
✅ **Refine if needed before adding sample data**

🚀 Let me know if any adjustments are required before moving to sample data population!"}
